featured.text: Google, which already uses prototypes of such cars to ferry its staff along Californian freeways, once put a blind man in a prototype and filmed him being driven off to buy takeaway hamburgers.
The angry passengers argued ______ with the airline staff because their flight was cancelled without any reason.
Our well-trained staff will provide the best possible service for you and your dog.
The staff of the dead mail offices has a variety of ways to deal with all of these pieces of dead mail.

other.text: Its staff members are always available to provide service.
The staff in a dead mail office may open a package in order to find .

definition.en_def: A group of people employed by an organization to carry out its activities.
definition.example: The staff worked late to complete the project on time.
